directions: Stir red cabbage, mango, pistachios, and 1 tablespoon mint together in a large salad bowl.
Whisk truffle oil, agave nectar, lime juice, champagne vinegar, and salt in a small bowl and pour dressing over salad; toss to combine. Garnish with 1 sprig fresh mint.
ingredients: 1 mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into wedges
1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint, or to taste (optional)
title: Red Cabbage Mango Pistachio Salad
